patthana16.39:1.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca namicchattaniyato nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.39:1.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā terasa, ārammaṇe nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate terasa.
patthana16.39:2.1_0: Micchattaniyataṁ nahetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasammattaniyato nanahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.39:2.1_1: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.
